_Info: This is the JSON based Configuration for BinMenu
AddItems Are your items not in the base that you
Want added to the menu for you every time.

Basic._Base: The starting folder that BinMenu reads from. End with \
Basic._ScriptRead: [bool] Determines if the PS1 scripts are read in
Basic._Editor: Defines a text editor to use from BinMenu
Basic._MenuAdds: [bool] Determines if the menu adds are used or not
Basic._WinHeight: How tall to draw the window.Not Working
Basic._WinWidth: How wide to draw the window.Not Working
Basic._BuffHeight: How tall to make the Buffer.Not Working
Basic._BuffWidth: How wide to make the Buffer.Not Working
